person.persName: Benjamin J. Mason (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Dicey Jennings Mason in Trigg County, Kentucky, on December 23, 1847. Father of Thomas W. Mason, Nancy Mason, Fannie Mason, Mary B. Mason, Jeff D. Mason, and R. E. L. Mason. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed Isaac Eison as a farmhand in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Caldwell County in 1860.
